attributes.action: Move the UK fully onto the metric system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a global market, it seems ridiculous that the UK operates two systems - old fashioned imperial measures and world-wide metric systems.  Most other countries have moved to metric, and the UK should finally do the same.  This would demonstrate that the Uk is a forward looking, modern country.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Move the UK fully onto the metric system."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12433.asp
